name: Realm of Cubes
description:
What is Realm Of Cubes?
Realm Of Cubes is a Voxel-based Action Adventure RPG. It takes place in a Fantasy world that is in need of help from a adventurer.



What features are in the game?
◽Choose between seven classes: Mage, Paladin, Ranger, Rogue, Warrior, Deathknight, Shaman.
◽Explore a hand crafted fantasy world inspired by World of Warcraft and Cube World.
◽Action Based Combat with aiming
◽Multiple Professions: Bartending, Cooking, Smelting, Tailoring, Alchemy, Camping, Blacksmithing, Fishing, Mining, and Gardening!
◽Different Mounts and achievments to collect!
◽Hang gliding!
◽Help out the residents by completing quest and defeating monsters around the world!
◽Unique Talent Trees for each class.
◽Level Progression up to 40 (so far!)
◽Play singleplayer or with a friend with couch coop!
◽Up to 12 Unique spell abilities for each class!
